title: feat: account API improvements + authorize page restyle
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Fresh Look for Auth
gist.blurb: The authorization page just got a cozy makeover with our signature green theme, plus smarter balance tracking in the API.
gist.summary: Restyled the authorization page to match the dashboard aesthetic and updated the account API to provide detailed balance breakdowns.
gist.impact: Users get a cleaner, consistent login experience, while developers can now track free tier credits versus paid packs separately.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee as a friendly doorman at a stylish pixel-art gate. The gate represents the new authorize page with its lime green borders. The bee is checking a guest list (permissions) with a smile.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute round bee mascot standing next to a stylish pixelated login gate with thick lime green (#ecf874) borders. Soft pastel gradient background. The bee holds a small pixel clipboard, welcoming a visitor. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee holding a shiny new pixelated ID card with a profile picture. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Behind the bee, a retro game UI displays 'Tier' and 'Pack' balance bars like health and mana. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Like Stardew Valley inventory screen. Emotionally warm, nostalgic but beautiful.
